## External Resources

Useful external learning materials:

- [Pro Git Book](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2) - Comprehensive Git reference
- [R for Data Science](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/) - Modern R programming (note: we use base R + data.table, not tidyverse)
- [The targets R Package User Manual](https://books.ropensci.org/targets/) - Official targets documentation
- [Longleaf Documentation](https://help.rc.unc.edu/longleaf-cluster/) - UNC HPC guides
